texts.text: 1.54 was a version of PlayStation 4 Edition released on July 4, 2017.[1] [edit]

MCCE-986 – World seeds not generating like other versions
MCCE-2020 – Placing items in chest crashes game
MCCE-2842 – Mob sounds bug
MCCE-3022 – New sounds are bugged
MCCE-3269 – Trees on new map not showing after update
MCCE-3308 – Armor sometimes does not give armor
MCCE-3667 – Game crashes when console has lots of worlds.
MCCE-4162 – Mob variants in and from spawners
MCCE-4575 – Dropper/glass item elevators not working
MCCE-4628 – Falling though the floor
MCCE-4751 – Shulker box yellow dye makes it green
MCCE-4811 – Pickaxe remains in inventory after breaking when opening chests
MCCE-4903 – If a mob is spawned on top of a fence by using an egg it will fall straight through it
MCCE-4953 – Haste II not working with efficiency V on tools
MCCE-4957 – Pistons are gone from the crafting menu, replaced by observer.
MCCE-4961 – Shulker box contents deleted
MCCE-4967 – Buckets disappear in furnaces
MCCE-4970 – Pistons do not update each other.
MCCE-4990 – Horse armor not working
MCCE-4997 – Sleeping during day bug
MCCE-5027 – Crafting recepe from piston disappeared
MCCE-5088 – Minecraft Wii U Crashes when loading/creating new world
MCCE-5097 – Crafting cake consumes buckets holding milk.
MCCE-5103 – Saving not working
MCCE-5137 – After playing for a while and after trying to save and leave it freezes and will not save progress at all and also freezes when dying
MCCE-5153 – Pistons not updating pistions
MCCE-5160 – All new beds are just called "Bed"
MCCE-5161 – Efficiency enchantment not working
MCCE-5166 – End rods not giving off particles
Fix for issue causing the loss of shulker box contents on loading from a previous save.
Fix for empty bucket not being returned to inventory after crafting a cake.
Fix for furnaces not leaving an empty bucket after using a lava bucket as fuel.
Fix for efficiency enchantments on tools not working correctly.
Fix for pistons not extending when the piston above them extends.
Fix for horse armor not appearing on horses that do not have markings.
Fix for pistons no longer being available in the Crafting menu.
Fix for observers outputting constant power if they can detect changes from another observer.

Xbox 360 Edition TU55
Xbox One Edition CU45
PlayStation 3 Edition 1.54
Wii U Edition Patch 25
Nintendo Switch Edition 1.0.5
"Minecraft: PlayStation 4 Edition Patch change logs" – Minecraft Forum, July 4, 2017.
